WriterProxy.name: TemporalTransformsWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write in a CSV the list of time indexed transforms
Documentation.long_help: Write in a CSV the list of time indexed transforms

WriterProxy.Documentation: Write in a CSV the list of time indexed transforms. Usually these transforms represent the pose trajectory of a solid over time. The CSV has the following columns: time(s),roll(d),pitch(d),yaw(d),X(m),Y(m),Z(m)

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The path to the CSV formated file to write.
